To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Takuri _takuri;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_takuri = Takuri(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_takuri.IsReady)
{
    var current = _takuri.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.takuri = self.Takuri(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.takuri.IsReady:
    current = self.takuri.Current.Value
